abstract: The Internet search giant on Thursday reported better-than-expected financial results for the first three months of the year, igniting a huge rally in the company shares.
snippet: The Internet search giant on Thursday reported better-than-expected financial results for the first three months of the year, igniting a huge rally in the company shares.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  The American economy may be weakening, but Google said once again that the slowdown has not affected its business.

headline.main: Google Defies the Economy and Shows Profit Surge
headline.print_headline: Google Defies the Economy And Reports a Profit Surge

abstract: Google this year will sell more advertising in the United Kingdom than the ITV television network, until now the largest ad seller in Britain. This is no surprise because Google now sells more advertising than any other company in the world.
snippet: Google this year will sell more advertising in the United Kingdom than the ITV television network, until now the largest ad seller in Britain. This is no surprise because Google now sells more advertising than any other company in the world.
lead_paragraph: Rory Cellan-Jones, a blogger for the BBC, calculates an interesting statistic from Google’s earnings release Thursday.

headline.main: How Big Is Google? Here’s Another Measure
